p: Among the bee diseases, Varroasisis considered one of the most widespread and dangerous diseases. It is caused by the Varroa destrucor Anderson and Trueman, 2000, mite, which parasitizes both brood and adult bees, thus causing considerable losses to the bee population. Several factors, such as the sale of queens and swarms and transhumance, have contributed to the spread of this disease worldwide [ 2, 3].
